name: Boundless Choreo
descHash:
Their dance glides gracefully, shadows and light silently exchanging places. She takes the other person's hand, her smile beaming into those indifferent eyes.
"Beautiful Ranger... Welcome to the stage of the Remembrance. At this proximity... you are far more enchanting than one might perceive."

The surroundings darken, a beam of light cascading from the dome above, tracing their evolving steps.
"However, some were meant to dance with us but have yet to arrive..."

In a spinning moment, she draws closer to that expressionless face, grips that cold hand, and softly inquires—
"Tell me. What have you done?"

As their dance steps grow hurried more and more, fragmented snippets of the past rush into her mind through their joined fingertips.
In a past that stretches back further and further, she hears the sound of rain and the lamentations just before life's extinguish. Then, she sees her dance partner holding a blood-red paper umbrella in the drizzling rain. Finally, as far as her eyes can see—

A field of drowned corpses bobbing in the deluge.

Panic-stricken, she tries to withdraw her hand, falling backward.
The surroundings brighten again, the banquet's clamor resurfacing. Her dance partner gently supports her waist, as if oblivious to the ordeal that just unfolded.
"What a lovely dance that was, Memokeeper. Shall we have another go?"

29328.name: Credit
29328.desc: This currency, used by the Interastral Peace Corporation to settle accounts with its customers, is now widely accepted as the hard currency for space travel.
29328.lore: "People run around fighting and trading for numbers in a terminal, but the truly precious cannot be bought."

549210.name: Tatters of Thought
549210.desc: A memoria fragment of fleeting thought. Crude material used for enhancement.
549210.lore:
Within the Memory Zone, thousands of thoughts flutter like dust. Broken thoughts accumulate, serving as nourishment and components for memes.

"A fleeting thought may dissipate into thin air or amass into obsessions."
comeFrom: Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

589818.name: Starfire Essence
589818.desc: A mature heliobus that ran away after the Flaming Catastrophe War. Used to level up Traces moderately for Nihility characters.
589818.lore:
A mean and nasty heliobus that appears like a full flame.
The size of a heliobus's flame when it materializes indicates its strength. This torch-like heliobus has just tasted consciousness and is eager to devour its host's emotions and desires.

"Absorb their emotions and sway their wills..."

633151.name: Fragments of Impression
633151.desc: A memoria fragment of profound impression. Normal material used for enhancement.
633151.lore:
Within the Memory Zone, the form of memories float as fleeting glimmers of light, and only profound and memorable fragments can condense it crystals.

"Memory is not a mere replication of past sensations, but a reconstruction of past impressions."
comeFrom: Memory Zone Meme at Equilibrium Level 2 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

673759.name: Heaven Incinerator
673759.desc: A beast-form heliobus that homogenized after the Flaming Catastrophe War. Used to level up Traces significantly for Nihility characters.
673759.lore:
An intelligent and powerful heliobus that has started to take the form of a beast.
The size of a heliobus's flame when it materializes indicates its strength. A large heliobus, having homogenized its numerous lesser peers, will gradually have a stable shape. These immortal beings can become so dangerous that they are considered calamities.

"Floods, fires, landslides, and thunderstorms..."

694487.name: Refined Aether
694487.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>6000</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694487.lore:
A canister of aether that has been extracted and distilled using special procedures.

"The Garden looks forward to recreating a past glory, but it is a 'past glory' selected by them. Do you understand?"

694488.name: Condensed Aether
694488.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>2000</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694488.lore:
A can of Aether refined through special techniques.

"Handle with care, do not drop or place pressure upon it. If damages and leaks occur, please refer to chapter II of the Leak Disaster Response Manual for emergency response."

694489.name: Sparse Aether
694489.desc: Enhancement material for Light Cones, provides <nobr>500</nobr> Light Cone EXP.
694489.lore:
An imaginary substance that shouldn't exist in reality. The basic material to create Light Cones.
The images contained in the Light Cones become clearer when infused with this substance.

"I see, so this is the supposed 'memoria' of the Garden of Recollection. No wonder the Memokeepers can set off on galactic voyages with memories."

717092.name: Shards of Desires
717092.desc: A memoria fragment of obsessive desires. Advanced material used for enhancement.
717092.lore:
Within the Memory Zone, memoria of desires develops ceaselessly. It absorbs thoughts and impressions, nurtures magic mirrors of desires, and reflects the eerie shadows of memetic entities.

"Memory points to the past, while desire points to the future. To seek desires from memory will cause dreams to become inverted, and inner demons will naturally be born."
comeFrom: Memory Zone Meme at Equilibrium Level 4 or higher
Dropped by enemies in Divergent Universe

874345.name: Fiery Spirit
874345.desc: Feeble heliobus that scattered after the Flaming Catastrophe War. Used to level up Traces slightly for Nihility characters.
874345.lore:
An innocent, formless heliobus.
The size of a heliobus's flame when it materializes indicates its strength. This little heliobus is innocent and naive and may be easily consumed by more powerful heliobi.

"Formless, rootless, and roaming boundless..."

skill.name: Scrutinize
skill.descHash: Increase the wearer's CRIT Rate by #1[i]%. The wearer deals #2[i]% more CRIT DMG to enemies that are currently Slowed or have reduced DEF.
